data.title: FILMED IN ARIZONA
data.meta_description: The Arizona Commerce Authority (ACA) is the state's leading economic development organization with a streamlined mission to grow and strengthen Arizona’s economy.
data.text:
FILMED IN ARIZONA

More than 5,000 films and TV shows have been filmed in Arizona since 1913 with the production of Arizona.

Below scroll to view some recent film & digital media projects that have wrapped after filming either in whole or in part in Arizona. (A production may have multiple locations, but only its Arizona locations are listed below.)

trailers: popular films & TV shows

filmed in arizona

Want to see your project listed here? It's simple. Tell us about your locations and upload photos, links, and trailers via our online form, That's A Wrap, for a chance to have your film or digital media project featured in Filmed in Arizona or via social media.
